name: Trepang2: Digital Deluxe Edition
summary:
Become the ultimate badass in Trepang2. Unleash hell on your enemies in this gory action-packed FPS set in the future and stop at nothing to get your revenge.

The Deluxe Edition includes:

- Trepang2 Full Game
- Season Pass including Survival Mode DLC (Available Now) and Story DLC coming soon.
